roleset.name: to ridicule
roleset.note: TAUNT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from taunt.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` The only way to reduce the costs is to say we do n't want to pay the bill , '' said Rep. Neal Smith ( D. , Iowa ) , who-3 *T*-3 taunted President Bush 's party to back up his campaign promise of supporting the claims of $ 20,000 per individual .
example.arg: who -> Rep. Neal Smith ( D. , Iowa)
to back up his campaign promise of supporting the claims of $ 20,000 per individual
